headline: Ventas (NYSE:VTR) Proposes Amendment to Increase Authorized Shares Before May Stockholders Meeting
summary: Ventas (NYSE:VTR) experienced a notable 16% price increase over the last quarter. A key event influencing this movement was the proposal to amend the company's certificate of incorporation to increase authorized shares, set for discussion at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders on May 13, 2025. The market context is relevant here; despite a mixed market with the Dow tumbling, the S&P 500 and Nasdaq showed resilience. Other positive signals for Ventas included strong fourth-quarter earnings...
